comments:
During the 'finish' action of a new Apache Tomcat 5.5 dynamic web project specification, the wizard 
consistently exits with a mysterious NullPointerException. As a result, the project is created, but not 
recognized as a Dynamic Web Project. The project only contains rudimentary .classpath & .project files. 
The complete error listing is reproduced below:

Which build did you use for creating the web project?

This wizard has been replaced in WTP M9 1112 integration driver.  This problem
no longer is valid.

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old and it is assumed really fixed and no longer useful or need further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error.
